title: DefineProjectScopeandRequirements-REVISED
description: This RFC outlines the requirements for the ServiceDependencyMapper tool. The target microservices architecture should be explicitly defined (e.g., Kubernetes, AWS Lambda). Desired visualization formats (diagrams, reports) are specified along with input data sources (logs, configuration files), analysis techniques (static or dynamic), output formats, user interface requirements (responsive design, interactive features including filtering and zooming options), security considerations (data privacy, authentication/authorization), performance requirements (response time, scalability), specific features or constraints (real-time dependency mapping, compatibility with various microservices frameworks), and any additional tools or libraries that may be necessary. The target audience for this tool should also be identified and categorized (developers, DevOps engineers, system architects). This task is currently in REVIEW status and has been reassigned to the project manager with a priority of 5. The following suggested changes have been made: 1. Clarify the target microservices architecture. 2. Add interactive UI features to the user interface requirements. 3. Incorporate data privacy and authentication/authorization security considerations. 4. Specify performance requirements in terms of response time and scalability. 5. Consider adding a feature for dependency impact analysis (highlighting the effects of removing or modifying a service on the overall architecture). If this RFC is approved, it will be moved to the IMPLEMENTATION state.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the ServiceDependencyMapper tool, including the components, data flow, and integration points with the target microservices architecture.

title: Implement Service Discovery and Mapping
description: Develop the core functionality to discover and map the dependencies between services in the target microservices architecture.

title: Develop Visualization Components
description: Implement the user interface components and visualizations to display the mapped service dependencies in an intuitive and interactive manner.

title: Implement Data Storage and Persistence
description: Design and implement the data storage and persistence layer to store and retrieve the mapped service dependencies.

title: Integrate with Target Microservices Architecture
description: Develop the necessary integration points and adapters to seamlessly integrate the ServiceDependencyMapper tool with the target microservices architecture.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement security measures and access controls to ensure the ServiceDependencyMapper tool is secure and accessible only to authorized users.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the ServiceDependencyMapper tool to ensure automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities to ensure the ServiceDependencyMapper tool meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Write User Documentation and Guides
description: Prepare user documentation, guides, and training materials to assist users in effectively utilizing the ServiceDependencyMapper tool.
